remarks: A useful lemma about finite sets.  If a property holds for a finite set, it holds for a minimal set.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Dec-2009.)
statement:
finminlem.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
finminlem $p |- ( E. x e. Fin ph -> E. x ( ph /\ A. y ( ( y C_ x /\ ps ) -> x = y ) ) ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
